title.rendered: “Digital Marketing Provides Work Flexibility Without Any Undue Pressure” – Ravi Thakur

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Ravi Thakur, currently working as a Social Media Executive at Sujata Home Appliances. Despite being a science student, his interest was always in marketing. And, before joining Digiperform, he always kept looking for good career options in the marketing domain. In a chit-chat session with us, he shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped him to understand the concept of online marketing and opt the same to persist his career as a freelancer. Have a look!

Digiperform- It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Ravi- Basically, I am a science & computer background student, but my interest has always been marketing. Moreover, I love music and always in search for new melodies & genres. I stay active on various social media platforms and follow tech sites to stay updated on new trends as well.

Digiperform- What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Ravi- I always had interest in marketing but I didn’t want to follow the same old chain of the door to door marketing. Additionally, I wasn’t comfortable with the field job and always been looking for freelancing options where I can work with flexibility without any undue pressure. And after some research, I realized Digital Marketing is the finest stream which offers you the platform to work as per your preference & comfort.

Digiperform- What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Ravi- I choose Digiperform for its superb course content that covers each & every module related to digital marketing. Also, the trainers are extremely knowledgeable and well aware of the subjects as well.

Digiperform- Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Ravi- The trainers are great. They teach you in a detailed manner and even share their live experiences as well to make you understand the concept clearly.

Digiperform- Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Ravi- Definitely, the content of the modules is great and provides you complete practical exposure to outshine.

Digiperform-  If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Ravi- 7 out of 10

Digiperform- Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Ravi- I would like to continue my career in freelancing and see myself as an influencer working for top-notch companies.

Digiperform- If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Ravi- Stay aware of latest trends, and always be open to learning.

Digiperform- Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Ravi- Great place to learn digital marketing systematically.  Thanks Ravi for being the part of Digiperform family.
